channel.title: Trying to run My client? Javac is not recognized?
channel.description: Ok, so when i go to run my client i downloaded, it says...'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command. please download jdk. I downloaded jdk 6u16, but i dont have my environmental variables set? would this be the problem? Please help :) and thanks!

item.title: Trying to run My client? Javac is not recognized?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

This compiler would work with JDK 1.6U16

@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause

This will run your server if the bat is created in the same location as the server class

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to run My client? Javac is not recognized?

item.title: Trying to run My client? Javac is not recognized?
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

I had this problem with my Compiler before but never with my run.bat. Try this: Right click run.bat>Edit. Then change the path to the current version of your Java by going to C:>Computer>Program Files>Java. Then see what version you have.

This is the only way I know how to fix this problem - so I hope I helped.

Fluffee

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to run My client? Javac is not recognized?

Ok, so when i go to run my client i downloaded, it says…‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command. please download jdk.
I downloaded jdk 6u16, but i dont have my environmental variables set? would this be the problem? Please help and thanks!
